title: BDSA Clinical Metadata Schema
description: The metadata fields that each case must have to include in the BDSA database, based on NACC fields.

NACCID.title: NACC ID
NACCID.description: NACCID is a unique identifier for each case in the NACC database.

NACCDAGE.title: Age at Death
NACCDAGE.description:
Age at death in years. NACC variable.
CDE: `age_at_death`

EDUC.title: Years of Education
EDUC.description:
Number of years of formal education. NACC variable.
CDE: `years_of_education`

RACE.title: Race
RACE.description:
Ethnoracial group, 1=White; 2= Black or African American; 3=American Indian or Alaska Native; 4=Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander; 5=Asian; 50=Other; 99=Unknown. NACC variable.
CDE: `race`

NACCUDSD.title: Final Cognitive Status
NACCUDSD.description:
Final cognitive status, 1 = Normal cognition; 2 = Impaired-not-MCI; 3 = MCI; 4 = Dementia. NACC variable.
CDE: `cog_status`

NPPMIH.title: Postmortem Interval (PMI) Hours
NPPMIH.description:
Number of hours between death and brain removal, 0.0–98.9 99.9 = Unknown- 4 = Not available. NACC variable.
CDE: `path_PMI_hours`

NPADNC.title: ADNC Severity Score
NPADNC.description:
NIA RI Criteria. 0 = Not AD; 1 = Low ADNC; 2 = Intermediate ADNC; 3 = High ADNC; 8 = Not assessed; 9 = Missing/unknown. NACC variable.
CDE: `path_nia_ri`

NPWBRWT.title: Whole Brain Weight
NPWBRWT.description:
Fresh brain weight in grams. NACC variable.
CDE: `brain_weight`
